value:
We will soar through the skies
together again one day—just as
we used to, Arion...

Travant took me captive when I was
very young, raising me to call him
Father after he murdered my parents.

You do so much for us every day...
Why not join me on a wyvern ride for
a change of pace? It will be delightful.

Tending to wyverns is not so hard.
They may seem threatening, but
they can still be quite cute at times.

When I'm bearing a divine weapon,
forgotten memories begin to surface.
A gentle gaze, a tender touch...

My name is Altena. I have come to
give you this on the behalf of your
friend $Nf.

I am descended from Njörun, and
I will not be defeated!

Pride clouds the vision. I must be
mindful of that.

My apologies. I meant to be more
than a mere burden...

You will get nothing but the very best
from me. I swear it—on the name of
my father. My true father.

I am Altena, Quan's daughter. As one
of the crusader Njörun's descendants,
I will display the gifts of my lineage.

Might I ask your opinion? I have been
wondering... What does "family" mean
to you, $Nu?$k$pI am of Leonster by blood, but I was
raised by Thracians. Either could just
as easily be called my family.$k$pBlood relationships, birthplace,
upbringing... All these things form
a complicated knot...$k$pBut perhaps, if I can show the people
who I am inside... It may help heal the
wound dividing the two countries.$k$pReunited with my brother and father,
we can work together to do just that,
as a family... That is my dream.
てやっ
You can't run!
うっ…
...failed...
Sorry, but...you die here.
Enough talk!
Get out of my way!
Stand aside!
Arion... My brother...
Hehe
I am Altena...the daughter of Quan, of Leonster.
...H—hey! You should really quit that!

Nothing can surpass the joy of my
reunion with Prince Leif and Finn.
Despite Travant's savage nature, I truly believed in him as my father.

I'll strive to see Thracia united...
as atonement for what I've done.
It's impossible now, Arion...but we'll be together again. Some day, after some time passes...
If I can help you make a difference in this world, I'm sure my father and mother would smile down on me.
Understood.
Please, wait.
Forgive me...
